title: Elmer’s Glow in The Dark Liquid Glue, Washable, Blue, 1 Quart, Glue for Making Slime
description: Electrify Arts, crafts, and Slime with the Neon shine of Elmer's glow in the dark liquid glue. While bright in the day, This craft glue truly comes to life at night, lighting up with a luminous Neon glow. It’s also great for making glue slime—just mix with Elmer's magical liquid. Washable, safe, and nontoxic, Elmer's glue is an easy, mess-free way to get creative For Arts and craft projects. Whether used for decorating, painting, gluing, or making slime, the possibilities are endless.
